attributes.action: Answer, why we abandoned Afghanistan as we did.
attributes.additional_details: There are questions that need answering on our part of the withdrawal from Afghanistan.
attributes.background: Answer, why we did not try to get the US to leave it's air power along with ours to help the Afghanistan military. Why we are abandoning this countries government, a government we helped to set up.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the withdrawal of military forces from Afghanistan, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can read a research briefing by the House of Commons Library into the withdrawal of military forces in Afghanistan and its implications for peace here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-9241/

If you want military forces to be redeployed to Afghanistan you might like to sign the following petition:

Redeploy UK Forces to Afghanistan to protect the citizens against the Taliban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594823

We could accept a petition calling for a public inquiry into the withdrawal of military forces from Afghanistan, if that's something you would like to happen.
